Name: Simple Punch
Ingredients: 40 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions:
Squeeze the lemon peels into chilled glass. Add other ingredients. Fill with ice and stir. Special ingredient No.1 Syrup Milk Oolong 
Add 50ml of concentrate oolong tea to 100g sugar syrup (1 parts of sugar to 1 part of water), boil and leave to cool, then filter .
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Anton Martaplias at BarDuck, Minsk, Belarus. Inspiration : “This year Bacardi Legacy was held in Belarus for the third time and I have participated each year. Twice I didn’t get to the top three, but I didn’t stop for a moment working towards my dream. Each day I got closer, with the support of my good friend Ilia; he gave me the ‘simple punch’ to action and now – bam – here I am at the Global Final!”
